name: pullgit
description: The task pulls the contents of a repo into a folder.
author: Dan Stocker
helpMarkDown: Pulls the contents of a specified git repo.

inputs.name: SourceRepo
inputs.label: Source Repo
inputs.helpMarkDown: Full Git URL of the source repo. Include protocol (e.g. https://)

inputs.name: SourceRepoUser
inputs.label: Repo Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The user name of the source repository. Leave blank for personal access token.

inputs.name: SourceRepoPass
inputs.label: Repo Password or PAT
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password or personal access token for the source repository. (if required)

inputs.name: Path
inputs.label: Drop Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The subdirectory that the files should be downloaded to. Leaving this empty will cause the task to attempt downloading the git repo into the current working directory.
